infoData.cta: This website is built on Gatsby and Github. Updated on Febuary 20th, 2021.
infoData.description:
ðŸ‘‹ Hi, my name is Minkyoung (MK) Lee. I'm a UI/UX designer with a background in Visual Communication Design and Information Science and Culture. In interaction design and human-computer interaction, my interest centers on online and mobile systems for communication and collaboration.
Currently, I am in the MDES program of Interaction Design, School of Design at the Carnegie Mellon University supported by the Korean Government Scholarship for Study Overseas. For more detailed information, please see my resume here.
